label: Accidental Misuse
definition: Accidental Misuse

label: Age Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's age, often impacting older or younger individuals

label: Authorisation Failure
definition: Something that acts as or causes Authorisation Failure

label: Benefit
definition: Something that acts as or causes benefits

label: Bias
definition: Bias is defined as the systematic difference in treatment of certain objects, people, or groups in comparison to others

label: Blackmail
definition: Something that acts as or causes Blackmail

label: Brute Force Authorisations
definition: Something that acts as or causes Brute Force Authorisations i.e. bypassing authorisations through brute forcing techniques

label: Caste Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's caste, a form of social stratification found in some cultures

label: Coercion
definition: Something that acts as or causes Coercion

label: Cognitive Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when humans are processing and interpreting information

label: Compensation
definition: Something that acts as or provides compensation - which can be monetary and financial or in other forms

label: Component Failure
definition: Something that acts as or causes Component Failure
scopenote: Here component refers to both physical and virtual components. The failure of a component may or may not also cause a failure in other related components or the systems they are part of

label: Component Malfunction
definition: Something that acts as or causes Component Malfunction
scopenote: Here component refers to both physical and virtual components. The malfunction of a component may or may not also cause a malfunction in other related components or the systems they are part of

label: Compromise Account
definition: Something that acts as or causes a compromised account that is then used by the compromiser

label: Compromise Account Credentials
definition: Something that acts as or causes Account Credentials to be compromised

label: Confidentiality Breach
definition: Something that acts as or causes Confidentiality Breach

label: Confirmation Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when hypotheses, regardless of their veracity, are more likely to be confirmed by the intentional or unintentional interpretation of information

label: Confounding Variables Bias
definition: Bias that occurs as a confounding variable that influences both the dependent variable and independent variable causing a spurious association

label: Copyright Violation
definition: Something that acts as or causes Copyright Violation

label: Coverage Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when a population represented in a dataset does not match the actual or real population that are being used

label: Cryptojacking
definition: Something that acts as or causes Cryptojacking

label: Damage
definition: Something that acts as or causes Damage

label: Data Aggregation Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when aggregating data covering different groups of objects has different statistical distributions that introduce bias into the data

label: Data Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when data properties that if unaddressed lead to systems that perform better or worse for different groups

label: Data Breach
definition: Something that acts as or causes Data Breach

label: Data Corruption
definition: Something that acts as or causes Corruption of Data
scopenote: This concept was called "Corruption Data" in DPV 2.0

label: Data Processing Bias
definition: Bias that occurs due to pre-processing (or post-processing) of data, even though the original data would not have led to any bias

label: Denial of Service Attack (DoS)
definition: Something that acts as or causes Denial of Service Attack (DoS)

label: Detriment
definition: Something that acts as or causes Detriment

label: Direct Discrimination
definition: Occurs when a person is treated less favorably than another in a comparable situation based on a protected characteristic (e.g., race, sex, disability)

label: Disability Discrimination
definition: Discrimination against individuals based on physical or mental disabilities

label: Discrimination
definition: Something that acts as or causes Discrimination

label: Distributed Denial of Service Attack (DDoS)
definition: Something that acts as or causes Distributed Denial of Service Attack (DDoS)

label: Environmental Risk
definition: Risks and issues that have their origin in environment or can affect the environment at large

label: Equipment Failure
definition: Something that acts as or causes Equipment Failure
scopenote: Here equipment refers to physical equipment

label: Equipment Malfunction
definition: Something that acts as or causes Equipment Malfunction
scopenote: Here equipment refers to physical equipment

label: Erroneous System Use
definition: Something that acts as or causes Erroneous System Use

label: Ethnic Discrimination
definition: Discrimination against individuals based on their ethnicity or cultural heritage

label: Excellence Discrimination
definition: Favoritism towards individuals deemed more competent or superior, often at the expense of others

label: Exposure to Harmful Speech
definition: Something that acts as or causes Harmful Speech
scopenote: This concept was called "HarmfulSpeech" in DPV 2.0

label: External Security Threat
definition: Concepts associated with security threats that are likely to originate externally

label: Extorsion
definition: Something that acts as or causes Extorsion

label: Financial Impact
definition: Things that cause or have the potential to impact financial resources

label: Financial Loss
definition: Something that acts as or causes Financial Loss which may be actual loss of existing financial assets or hypothetical loss of financial opportunity

label: Fraud
definition: Something that acts as or causes Fraud

label: Gender Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's gender identity or gender expression

label: Geographic Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's geographical origin or residence

label: Group Attribution Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when a human assumes that what is true for an individual or object is also true for everyone, or all objects, in that group

label: Harm
definition: Something that acts as or causes Harm to humans
scopenote: This concept refers to the general abstract notion of harm

label: Homophobia
definition: Hostility or prejudice against individuals who are or are perceived to be homosexual

label: Human Errors
definition: Something that acts as or causes Human Errors

label: Identity Fraud
definition: Something that acts as or causes Identity Fraud

label: Identity Theft
definition: Something that acts as or causes Identity Theft

label: Illegal Data Processing
definition: Something that acts as or causes Illegal Processing of Data
scopenote: This concept was called "IllegalProcessingData" in DPV 2.0

label: Implicit Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when a human makes an association or assumption based on their mental models and memories

label: In-Group Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when showing partiality to one's own group or own characteristics

label: Indirect Discrimination
definition: Occurs when an apparently neutral provision, criterion, or practice puts individuals of a certain group at a disadvantage compared to others, unless it can be objectively justified

label: Individual Risk
definition: Risks and issues that affect or have the potential to affect specific individuals

label: Informativeness Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when the mapping between inputs present in the data and outputs are more difficult to identify for some group

label: Injury
definition: Something that acts as or causes Injury

label: Intentional Misuse
definition: Intentional Misuse

label: Intercept Communications
definition: Something that acts as or causes Interception of Communications
scopenote: This concept was called "InterceptionCommunications" in DPV 2.0

label: Judicial Costs
definition: Something that involves or causes judicial costs to be paid

label: Judicial Penalty
definition: Something that involves or causes judicial penalties to be paid

label: Language Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's language, often linked to national origin or ethnicity

label: Legal Risk
definition: Risks and issues that have their basis in legal requirements and enforcement

label: Lose of Credibility
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Credibility

label: Lose of Customer Confidence
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Customer Confidence

label: Lose of Goodwill
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Goodwill

label: Lose of Negotiating Capacity
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Negotiating Capacity

label: Lose of Opportunity
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Opportunity

label: Lose of Reputation
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Reputation

label: Lose of Trust
definition: Something that acts as or causes Loss of Trust

label: Malicious Activity
definition: Intentional actions designed to harm, exploit, manipulate, or disrupt individuals, systems, or organizations for personal gain or detriment to others

label: Malicious Code Attack
definition: Something that acts as or causes Malicious Code Attack

label: Malware Attack
definition: Something that acts as or causes Malware Attack

label: Material Damage
definition: Something that acts as or causes Material Damage
scopenote: The criteria for what is considered material damage is based in jurisdictional laws and norms

label: Misandry
definition: Dislike, contempt, or prejudice against men

label: Misogyny
definition: Dislike, contempt, or prejudice against women

label: Misuse
definition: Something that acts as or causes Misuse

label: Nationality Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's nationality or citizenship

label: Non-Material Damage
definition: Something that acts as or causes Non-Material Damage
scopenote: The criteria for what is considered material damage is based in jurisdictional laws and norms

label: Non-Normality Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when the dataset is subject to a different (i.e. non-normal) distribution (e.g., Chi-Square, Beta, Lorentz, Cauchy, Weibull or Pareto) where the results can be biased and misleading

label: Non-Response Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when people from certain groups opt-out of surveys at different rates than users from other groups. This is also called as Participation bias

label: Operational Security Risk
definition: Risks and issues that arise during operational processes

label: Out-Group Homogeneity Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when seeing out-group members as more alike than in-group members when comparing attitudes, values, personality traits, and other characteristics

label: Payment
definition: Something that acts as or provides payment e.g. to access a service or purchase resources

label: Personal Safety Endangerment
definition: Something that acts as or causes Personal Safety Endangerment

label: Phishing Scam
definition: Something that acts as or causes Phishing Scam

label: Physical Assault
definition: Something that acts as or causes Physical Assault

label: Psychological Harm
definition: Something that acts as or causes Psychological Harm

label: Public Order Breach
definition: Something that acts as or causes Public Order Breach

label: Racial Discrimination
definition: Discrimination against individuals because of their racial background or skin color

label: Racism
definition: Prejudice or discrimination against people based on their race

label: Re-identification
definition: Something that acts as or causes Re-identification
scopenote: Use this concept for reidentification in an internal context. For reidentification performed by external entities see concept UnauthorisedReidentification

label: Religious Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's religious beliefs or practices

label: Remuneration
definition: Something that acts as or provides renumeration which is in monetary or financial form

label: Reputational Risk
definition: Risks and issues that affect the reputation of the organisation

label: Requirements Bias
definition: Bias that occurs in or during requirements creation
scopenote: Requirements bias also represents occasions for the human cognitive biases to manifest

label: Reverse Discrimination
definition: Discrimination against members of a majority or historically dominant group, often in the context of efforts to promote equality

label: Reward
definition: Something that acts as or provides rewards i.e. a benefit given for some service or activity that is not a payment or fee

label: Erosion of Rights
definition: The gradual weakening or reduction of the scope and protection of rights
scopenote: Erosion of rights typically only applies to passive rights which always apply, since for active rights the exercise of that    right is what enables it. An active right can be eroded over time it is limited consistently and increasingly such that the scope of the right is reduced over time. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Obstruction of Rights
definition: Interference with or blocking of the exercise of rights
scopenote: In obstruction, the right is not denied, limited, or unfulfilled - but the requirements to enable exercise of the rights are increased to the point of discouraging or obstructing the exercise of that right. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Denial of Rights
definition: The refusal or withholding or denial of the existence or applicability of rights
scopenote: The denial of the right refers to the argument that a right does not apply at all for a particular case. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Prevent Exercising of Rights
definition: Actions or measures that prevent an individual or group from exercising their legal rights.
scopenote: This concept was called "PreventExercisingOfRights" in DPV 2.0. Violation of a right is a bar for actionable actions by an authority. Other impacts on right may be found to construe a violation of the right, but that is not necessarily always the case i.e. not all impacts are violations of a right. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Impact to Rights
definition: Something that acts as or causes Impact to Rights
scopenote: This concept was called "ImpactToRights" in DPV 2.0. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Limitation of Rights
definition: A limitation or restrictions on the scope or exercise of rights
scopenote: This concept was called "LimitationOfRights" in DPV 2.0. The    limitation refers to the applicability and scope of the right, and not in the ability to exercise that right. Limitation is therefore fulfilment of the right and its obligations - but for a scope other than what was intended or expected. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Unfulfilment of Rights
definition: Failure to meet or complete the fulfilment of rights
scopenote: Here unfulfilment refers to non-completion of the right's obligations and processes. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Violation of Rights
definition: The infringement or breach of rights in a manner that constitues a 'violation' of those rights
scopenote: This concept was called "ViolationOfRights" in DPV 2.0. Though specified as a plural i.e. 'rights', this concept can be applied to a singular right

label: Rule-Based System Design
definition: Bias that occurs due to developer experience and expert advice having a significant influence on rule-based system design
scopenote: Rule based system design also potentially introduces various forms of human cognitive bias

label: Sabotage
definition: Something that acts as or causes Sabotage

label: Sampling Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when data records are not collected randomly from the intended population

label: Scam
definition: Something that acts as or causes Scam

label: Security Attack
definition: Something that acts as or causes an attack on security with the aim of undermining it

label: Security Breach
definition: Something that acts as or causes Security Breach

label: Selection Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when a dataset's samples are chosen in a way that is not reflective of their real-world distribution

label: Sex Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's biological sex

label: Sexism
definition: Discrimination based on a person's sex or gender, typically involving unequal treatment or stereotyping

label: SexualOrientation Discrimination
definition: Discrimination based on a person's sexual orientation, typically against those who are not heterosexual

label: Sexual Violence
definition: Something that acts as or causes Sexual Violence

label: Simpson'S Paradox Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when a trend that is indicated in individual groups of data reverses when the groups of data are combined

label: Social Disadvantage
definition: Something that acts as or causes Social Disadvantage

label: Societal Bias
definition: Bias that occurs when similiar cognitive bias (conscious or unconscious) is being held by many individuals in society

label: Societal Risk
definition: Risks and issues that affect or have the potential to affect society at large or specific groups in society

label: Spoofing
definition: Something that acts as or causes Spoofing

label: Statistical Bias
definition: Bias that occurs as the type of consistent numerical offset in an estimate relative to the true underlying value, inherent to most estimates

label: System Failure
definition: Something that acts as or causes System Failure
scopenote: Here system refers to both hardware and software systems

label: System Intrusion
definition: Something that acts as or causes System Intrusion

label: System Malfunction
definition: Something that acts as or causes System Malfunction
scopenote: Here system refers to both hardware and software systems

label: Terrorism
definition: Something that acts as or causes Terrorism

label: Transphobia
definition: Hostility or prejudice against transgender people or those perceived as not conforming to traditional gender norms

label: Unauthorised Access to Premises
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Access to Premises

label: Unauthorised Activity
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Activity

label: Unauthorised Code Access
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Code Access

label: Unauthorised Code Disclosure
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Code Disclosure

label: Unauthorised Code Modification
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Code Modification

label: Unauthorised Data Access
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Data Access

label: Unauthorised Data Disclosure
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Data Disclosure

label: Unauthorised Data Modification
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Data Modification

label: Unauthorised Information Disclosure
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Information Disclosure

label: Unauthorised Re-Identification
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Re-Identification

label: Unauthorised Resource Use
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised Resource Use

label: Unauthorised System Access
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised System Access

label: Unauthorised System Modification
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unauthorised System Modification

label: Unwanted Code Deletion
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unwanted Code Deletion

label: Unwanted Data Deletion
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unwanted Data Deletion

label: Unwanted Disclosure of Data
definition: Something that acts as or causes Unwanted Disclosure of Data

label: User Risks
definition: Concepts associated with risks that arise due to User or Human use

label: Violating Code of Conduct
definition: Something that acts as or causes Violation of Code of Conduct
scopenote: This concept was called "ViolationCodeConduct" in DPV 2.0

label: Violation of Contractual Obligation
definition: Something that acts as or causes Violation of Contractual Obligations
scopenote: This concept was called "ViolationContractualObligations" in DPV 2.0

label: Violating Ethics Code
definition: Something that acts as or causes Violation of Ethics Code
scopenote: This concept was called "ViolationEthicalCode" in DPV 2.0

label: Violation of Legal Obligations
definition: Something that acts as or causes Violation of Legal Obligations
scopenote: This concept was called "ViolationRegulatoryObligations" in DPV 2.0

label: Violating Policy
definition: Something that acts as or causes violation of policy which can be either internal or external policy

label: Violation of Statutory Obligations
definition: Something that acts as or causes Violation of Statutory Obligations
scopenote: This concept was called "ViolationStatutoryObligations" in DPV 2.0

label: Violence against children
definition: Something that acts as or causes Child Violence
scopenote: This concept was called "ChildViolence" in DPV 2.0
